nodes.text: The Novan system was located in the Tolonda sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with Novanian grog, a beverage from the island of N'van on the Corporate Sector planet Ban-Satir II.

The Novan system was mentioned in "Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star, How I Wonder Where We Are," a 1990 roleplaying game source article written by Glen Allison as a supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and published in Voyages SF 13.
